# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="a2713-102">Ievietot attēlus e-pasta ziņojumu vai kalendāra notikums</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a2713-103">Fotogrāfijas, gifs vai klipkopas var ievietot no datora vai OneDrive kā inline attēlus e-pasta ziņojumus, kalendāra ierakstus vai e-parakstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a2713-104">Sākt rakstīt ziņu vai izveidot kalendāra notikums.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="a2713-105">Atlasiet ikonu **Iespraust attēlus vienā rindiņā**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a2713-106">sastādīšanas (blakus **pievienot** ikonas loga apakšdaļā</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="a2713-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-107"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="a2713-108">Izvēlieties attēlu, ko vēlaties ievietot, un izvēlieties **Atvērt**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="a2713-109">Velciet stūri, lai mainītu attēla izmērus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="a2713-110">Ar peles labo pogu noklikšķiniet uz attēla, lai skatītu formatēšanas opcijas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a2713-111">Lasīt vairāk par to, kā [Pievienot failus Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a2713-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
